items.title: All Steps | REST Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for REST Connector. Automatically generate steps from any OpenAPI endpoint and include them in your forensic and ediscovery workflows with the Sequence REST connector.

items.title: RESTDelete Step | REST Connector Documentation
items.description: Delete a REST resource. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: RESTGetJSON Step | REST Connector Documentation
items.description: Get JSON from a REST service. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: RESTGetStream Step | REST Connector Documentation
items.description: Get data from a REST service. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: RESTPatch Step | REST Connector Documentation
items.description: Executes a REST Patch request. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: RESTPost Step | REST Connector Documentation
items.description: Create a REST resource and return the id of the created resource. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: RESTPut Step | REST Connector Documentation
items.description: Executes a REST Put request. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.
